body.p: DHARMA TEI Customization written by Daniel Balogh and Arlo Griffiths based on Epidoc schema.

lacunaEnd lacunaStart listWit rdgGroup wit witDetail witEnd witStart witness

sch:rule.sch:report: Divs other than @type=textpart may not nest in divs of different @type
ex should only appear inside expan
ex should not be a child of abbr
gap may have @quantity (a figure) or @extent (a descriptive text value) but not both
If gap has @quantity then @unit is required
gap may not appear within supplied text

elementSpec.desc: marks the start of each line of the transcribed text, including the first

valItem.desc: Dated by the archaeolgical context, stratigraphy or associated finds
Dated by the material, iconographic or other physical context of the object itself
Text dated by nomenclature or onomastics
Text dated by an office or rank, e.g. the reign of an emperor or other ruler
Text dated by known persons named or implied within it
Dated via textual or linguistic context (other than explicit date or titles)
Dated by the use of official titles

sch:rule.sch:report: space may have @quantity (a figure) or @extent (a descriptive text value) but not both
If space has @quantity then @unit is required

elementSpec.desc: Character that cannot be identified unambiguously outside of its context. May contain character data and g only.
